title: Can't view highlight WEBMs
body:
Ever since patch 9 I can't view any of my highlights from the folder, I can only view them in client?
How do I fix this its been happening for a while and its very annoying.

replies.body: You refer to "WEBMs" - the "highlights from the folder" - but then you say you "can only view them in client"? The client doesn't play .webm files. It only plays back LoL replay files. Which files are you trying to open, exactly?

I'm referring to when you go to "Documents" than "League of Legends" than "Highlights" all the saved WEBMs for replays show up there.
prior to 9.1 I was able to view them there and edit them but from 9.1 onwards I'm only able to view them on the client. This makes me unable to edit or post them.
I can open them in VLC so idk lol

.rofl files are replays 
.webm files are highlights

The client does play the webm highlights. They are usually found in ~/Documents/League of Legends/Highlights. Replays are found in ~/Documents/League of Legends/Replays. 

The "highlights" tab under your profile in the client plays the .webm highlights.
Playing replays from the match history plays the .rofl replays
